=== (*) Notes and recipes ===

==== Live-CD boots until desktop? ====
* Ubuntu GNU/Linux 8.04 (Hardy Heron): Add the parameter '''fb=false''' to the kernel line

==== Image seen on screen? ====
* Lubuntu GNU/Linux 11.04 (Natty Narwhal): At least 4MiB of RAM memory must be shared for graphics.
